componentDescription:
Drop-in replacement of the `Radio`, `Switch` and `Checkbox` component.
Use this component if you want to display an extra label.

propDescriptions.classes: Sobrescreve ou extende os estilos aplicados para o componente. Veja a API CSS abaixo para maiores detalhes.
propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each slot inside.
propDescriptions.control: A control element. For instance, it can be a Radio, a Switch or a Checkbox.
propDescriptions.disableTypography: If true, the label is rendered as it is passed without an additional typography node.
propDescriptions.inputRef: Pass a ref to the input element.
propDescriptions.label: A text or an element to be used in an enclosing label element.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the state is changed.

Signature:
function(event: React.SyntheticEvent) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new checked state by accessing event.target.checked (boolean).
propDescriptions.sx: A propriedade do sistema que permite definir as suas substituições, assim como estilos CSS adicionais. Veja a `sx` page para mais detalhes.
